revision.text:
This is a property of type [[Has type::URL]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "SSO" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{SSO
|SSOURL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! SSO URL | [[SSO has URL::{{{SSOURL|}}}]] |- ! | {{#ask:[[Standard has SSO::{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]]|format=list}} |} [[Category:SSOs]]

This is the "SSO" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=SSO}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|SSO}}} {| class="formtable" ! URL: | {{{field|SSOURL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::SSO]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "Standard" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Standard
|StandardSSO=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! SSO | [[Standard has SSO::{{{StandardSSO|}}}]] |- ! | {{#ask:[[Standard version is instance of::{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]]|format=list}} |} [[Category:Standards]]

This is the "Standard" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Standard}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|Standard}}} {| class="formtable" ! StandardSSO: | {{{field|StandardSSO|input type=combobox|values from category=SSOs}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::Standard]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::URL]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Text]].
The allowed values for this property are: * [[Allows value::Current]] * [[Allows value::Candidate]] * [[Allows value::Obsolete]]
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "StandardVersion" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{StandardVersion
|Standard=
|Status=
|DocumentationURL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! Instance of standard | [[Standard version is instance of::{{{Standard|}}}]] |- ! Status | [[Standard version status::{{{Status|}}}]] |- ! Documentation URL | {{#arraymap:{{{DocumentationURL|}}}|,|x|[[Standard version documentation URL::x]]}} |} [[Category:Standard Versions]]

This is the "StandardVersion" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=StandardVersion}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|StandardVersion}}} {| class="formtable" ! Standard: | {{{field|Standard|input type=combobox|values from category=Standards}}} |- ! Status: | {{{field|Status}}} |- ! DocumentationURL: | {{{field|DocumentationURL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Text]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::URL]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "Vendor" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Vendor
|Country=
|URL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! Country | [[Vendor from country::{{{Country|}}}]] |- ! URL | [[Vendor has URL::{{{URL|}}}]] |} [[Category:Vendors]]

This is the "Vendor" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Vendor}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|Vendor}}} {| class="formtable" ! Country: | {{{field|Country}}} |- ! URL: | {{{field|URL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Boolean]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Boolean]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::URL]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "License" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{License
|OSI approved=
|Commercial=
|URL=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! OSI approved | [[License is OSI approved::{{{OSI approved|}}}]] |- ! Is commercial? | [[License is commercial::{{{Commercial|}}}]] |- ! URL to license text | [[License is described on URL::{{{URL|}}}]] |} [[Category:Licenses]]

This is the "License" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=License}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|License}}} {| class="formtable" ! OSI approved: | {{{field|OSI approved}}} |- ! Commercial: | {{{field|Commercial}}} |- ! URL: | {{{field|URL}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::OrganizationalUnit]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::ComponentSteward]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "OrganizationalUnit" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{OrganizationalUnit
|Parent=
|Steward=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! Parent (if any) | [[Parent organizational unit::{{{Parent|}}}]] |- ! Steward | [[Organizational unit steward::{{{Steward|}}}]] |} [[Category:Organizational Units]]

This is the "OrganizationalUnit" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=OrganizationalUnit}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|OrganizationalUnit}}} {| class="formtable" ! Parent: | {{{field|Parent|values from category=Organizational Units|input type=combobox}}} |- ! Steward: | {{{field|Steward|values from category=Component Stewards|input type=combobox}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Text]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Email]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Text]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "ComponentSteward" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=ComponentSteward}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|ComponentSteward}}} {| class="formtable" ! Name: | {{{field|Name|rows=1}}} |- ! Email: | {{{field|Email}}} |- ! Phone: | {{{field|Phone|rows=1}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Text]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::DependencyVersion]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::ComponentSteward]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "Server" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{Server
|Hostname=
|OS=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! Hostname | [[Server hostname::{{{Hostname|}}}]] |- ! Operating System | [[Server OS::{{{OS|}}}]] |} [[Category:Servers]]

This is the "Server" form. To create a page with this form, enter the page name below; if a page with that name already exists, you will be sent to a form to edit that page. {{#forminput:form=Server}} [[Category:Simularch]]
{{{for template|Server}}} {| class="formtable" ! Hostname: | {{{field|Hostname|input type=text}}} |- ! OS: | {{{field|OS|input type=combobox|values from category=Dependency Versions}}} |} {{{end template}}} '''Free text:''' {{{standard input|free text|rows=10}}} {{{standard input|summary}}} {{{standard input|minor edit}}} {{{standard input|watch}}} {{{standard input|save}}} {{{standard input|preview}}} {{{standard input|changes}}} {{{standard input|cancel}}}

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::Server]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is a property of type [[Has type::Page]]. It links to pages that use the form [[Has default form::ComponentSteward]].
[[Category:Simularch]]

This is the "InfrastructureFacility" template. It should be called in the following format: 
{{InfrastructureFacility
|Servers=
|Steward=
}}
Edit the page to see the template text. [[Category:Simularch]] {| class="wikitable" ! Servers Used | {{#arraymap:{{{Servers|}}}|,|x|[[Infrastructure facility uses servers::x]]}} |- ! Steward | [[Infrastructure facility steward::{{{Steward|}}}]] |} [[Category:Infrastructure Facilities]]
